articles.title: Vaccines must be affordable for the public good, Azmin tells Apec trade ministers - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Members of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (Apec) must guard against "vaccine nationalism" and vaccine stockpiling, says International Trade and Industry Minister Datuk Seri Azmin Ali.

articles.title: PMD lift fire: 10 seconds all it took to claim life of 20-year-old delivery rider - AsiaOne
articles.description: Ten seconds was all it took to claim the life of a food delivery rider whose personal mobility device (PMD) burst into flames while he was in a lift, Lianhe Wanbao reported. The incident occurred at Block 537 Woodlands Drive 16 on Thursday (June 3) night, wit…
articles.content:
Ten seconds was all it took to claim the life of a food delivery rider whose personal mobility device (PMD) burst into flames while he was in a lift, Lianhe Wanbao reported.
